channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report X-2023120490
item.description:
Report X-2023120490

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-14T21:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-06
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This package was visibly wet. Upon further inspection, this package was dropped, there was also no inner packaging causing the liquid to seep out the cap. DescribePack: This package was dropped, also no inner packaging. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: spill pads and spill tote.

item.title: Report X-2023120110
item.description:
Report X-2023120110

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-15T21:09:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-25
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Unload manager stated package was obviously leaking as soon as he opened the trailer door. Shipping carton is soaked through and is falling apart. While there is no visible damage to bottle, it is determined through inspection that there is an active leak coming from the bottom of the bottle at a very slow pace. Bottle has been obviously subjected to elevation change as it is very sucked in. DescribePack: Unable to see actual holes in bottle but it is leaking DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Brought to QA immediately upon discovery

item.title: Report X-2023120097
item.description:
Report X-2023120097

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-14T21:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-24
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet Box discovered by package during unload. PH notified Manager, Manager secured package in Hazmat lined tote using gloves. Delivered to QA. DescribePack: The plastic bottle containing contents was missing lid which was found in the box loose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Secured package in lined hazmat tote.

item.title: Report X-2023120023
item.description:
Report X-2023120023

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-14T21:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-20
  • City: LAS VEGAS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered soiled. Package was opened to discover a puncture near the lid by the metal handle. This caused leaking ultimately damaging the shipment. DescribePack: One hole one side of the bucket, just under the lip. Hole is 1.5 centimeters. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Contained in hazmat tote and placed under ventilation due to strong odor.

item.title: Report X-2023111348
item.description:
Report X-2023111348

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-13T18:12:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-25
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED ABOUT AN ON-ROAD LEAKER. THE SUPERVISOR CALLED BACK AND SAID THEY WOULD JUST BRING TRUCK BACK TO FACILITY. SHORTLY AFTER THAT THE PACKAGE ARRIVED TO THE DMP. RESPONDER QUICKLY RESPONDED WITH FULL PPE AND FOLLOWED MY DECISION TREE.

item.title: Report X-2023111096
item.description:
Report X-2023111096

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-09
  • City: LAS VEGAS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat was found while being unloaded and was sent o QA STATION FOR FURTHER INSPESTIONS DescribePack: HAZMAT LID OR COVER IS BROKEN CAUSING IT TO SPILL OUT . DISCOVER THAT IT WAS A UNDECLARED HAZMAT DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: HAZMAT WAS PLACE IN A HAZMAT TOTE
